nodes.text: Secret route through the Hoth system

During the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, the prototype warship fleet from the Republic Navy used a secret route through the Outer Rim Territories that passed through the Hoth system. The fleet was ambushed along the route by the Imperial Navy in 3665 BBY, and the resultant battle reached its peak in the Hoth system.
